Public.bio: The guest is a bestselling author of psychological thrillers with over 5 million books sold worldwide. Their latest novel has spent 30 weeks on the New York Times bestseller list. Known for complex character development and unexpected plot twists, they've successfully transitioned from traditional to hybrid publishing.
